00024 #ifndef COIN_SOSELECTONE_H
00025 #define COIN_SOSELECTONE_H
00026 
00027 #include <Inventor/engines/SoSubEngine.h>
00028 #include <Inventor/fields/SoMField.h>
00029 #include <Inventor/fields/SoSFInt32.h>
00030 
00031 class SoEngineOutput;
00032 
00033 
00034 class COIN_DLL_API SoSelectOne : public SoEngine {
00035   typedef SoEngine inherited;
00036 
00037   SO_ENGINE_HEADER(SoSelectOne);
00038 
00039 public:
00040   SoSFInt32 index;
00041   SoMField * input;
00042 
00043   SoEngineOutput * output; // The SoSField-version of the SoMField-type.
00044 
00045   SoSelectOne(SoType inputtype);
00046   static void initClass(void);
00047 
00048 private:
00049   SoSelectOne(void);
00050   ~SoSelectOne();
00051 
00052   virtual void evaluate(void);
00053 
00054   virtual SbBool readInstance(SoInput * in, unsigned short flags);
00055   virtual void writeInstance(SoOutput * out);
00056 
00057   void initialize(const SoType inputfieldtype);
00058 
00059   virtual void copyContents(const SoFieldContainer * from,
00060                             SbBool copyconnections);
00061 
00062   // SoSelectOne instances uses a dynamic set of inputs and outputs,
00063   // as they are not common for all instances of the class (like for
00064   // most of the other engines).
00065   SoFieldData * dynamicinput;
00066   SoEngineOutputData * dynamicoutput;
00067 
00068   // Avoid a g++/egcs warning on the private default constructor.
00069   friend class dummy;
00070 };
00071 
00072 #endif // !COIN_SOSELECTONE_H
